content: a very simple pattern to make a lovey out of circulo garro yarn when i purchased this skein i assumed this would be what the pattern for it was but really they had designed it for a hat using the animal head as a pom pom so needs must i used less than 1 skein of the yarn and my lovie is about 8 from the middle to the edge on a side not a corner you could use any weight of yarn with an appropriate needle for that size or any worsted weight yarn
